title: Turn It Into Passion!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Aaaaagh, I can’t sleeep~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby toooo~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Calm down, Chika-chan, Ruby-chan. I know you’re excited about our live, but if you don’t sleep, you won’t be at full power tomorrow, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>That would be a problem! I have to sleep!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>But Ruby is too nervous to sleep.... Are you dealing with it just fine, You-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I’m already used to it because of my diving competitions. So, I’ll tell you two about something nice.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Something nice?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>A way to turn your excitement and nervousness into a silent burning passion. Alright so, let’s all hold hands and take a deep breath~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>*Inhale*, *Exhale*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Uuu, it’s not working! I’m still so excited~. Let’s just talk a little bit more, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
